channel.title: How do i make a help menu to go with tele command?
channel.description:
how do i make it so when u teleport to a certain place a help menu pops up???
in my case its when utele to my mini game that i made............
::maskmini
how do i make it so a help menu will pop up when ppl use that command????

item.title: How do i make a help menu to go with tele command?
item.dc:creator: @ingo345 ingo345
item.source: How do i make a help menu to go with tele command?

item.title: How do i make a help menu to go with tele command?
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

use a void to open the method and in the spell command call the void like
ifplayerrights == 2(name here)) {
menu();
toX 3424;
toY 3535;
sendMessage(“You quickly teleport out”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a help menu to go with tele command?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Hmm… Try this: [code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commandname”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest(“title at very top”, 8144);

//Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“title”, 8145);
sendQuest(“1st line”, 8147);
sendQuest(“2nd line”, 8148);
sendQuest(“3rd line”, 8149);
sendQuest(“4th line”, 8150);
sendQuest(“5th line”, 8151);
sendQuest(“6th line”, 8152);
sendQuest(“7th line”, 8153);
sendQuest(“8th line”, 8154);
sendQuest(“9th line”, 8155);
sendQuest(“10th line”, 8156);
sendQuest(“11 line”, 8157);
sendQuest(“12th line”, 8159);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}[/code]

Where you see sendQuest("title", 8145); sendQuest("1st line", 8147); (The 8145 and 8147) that means there would be a space between those two. It would read:
title

1st line

Mess around with the numbers for a little bit and you’ll understand it. You may or may not be able to add more lines, I’m not sure if that’s the limit, or if there even is a limit.

Read full topic
